resources.string: Your paper key is the only way to restore your Crypton if you lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded. \n\nWe will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
I understand that my wallet and tokens are held securely on this device only and not any servers
I understand that if this app is moved to another device or is deleted, my wallet can be only recovered with the backup phrase that I have written down and saved in a secure place
Changing the phone\'s unlock PIN in your Android OS settings would reset the wallet. You will need your backup phrase to restore your wallet after that
Enter the following words from your paper key
Please, enter words from your paper key.
Entered words do not match. Please, make sure you write down your words exactly as they appear in the previous step and in correct order.
The best of the best crypto wallet ever
Write down on paper and keep safe
